descriptionHtml:
There were a few spells in Elder Scrolls IV Oblivion that I liked and are missing in Skyrim. I have tried my best to recreate them. Some of them are -

Bound Armor
Reflect Spell
Slow Target
Vanish Target, etc.

Special THANKS to azarkiowa for the Ponytail Hairstyles (skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31797/) and DreamBurrow for Regal Assassin Armor (skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24342/). They were most helpful.

Last but not the least, thanks to -
http://www.creationkit.com/
http://www.acapela-group.com/text-to-speech-interactive-demo.html
author: SelfishUglyBad
